sect2.para: Used to mute a signal. Sets the output to 0 when Mute is set to True.

sect3.para: Specifies the data type of the input and output streams.

sect3.para: Specifies whether to mute the input. The 'True' and 'False' options are selectable through the drop-down menu. You can also type the name of a variable in this box.
